sense.name: an expert in the analysis of data, often financial
sense.examples: Analysts at the NSA appear to have deciphered a terrorist plot. At least one analyst believes the energy sector is due for a price correction. Don't pay attention to the political analysts during an election year.

sense.name: a medical doctor specializing in psychiatry
sense.examples: Mary really likes her new analyst. His analyst is prescribing Prozac for his delusions. A panel of analysts determined that the prisoner was mentally fit to go to trial.
